title: Yasuo builds
body:
I am a Yasuo Main. I love the gameplay style of him and the sense that you're a drunk samurai that has soap. Normally I take him top lane and build him in this order: {{item:3046}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3153}}  and take these spells: {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:12}} 

Is it possible to take this build Mid as well?

replies.body: you stole my original build from S4. thief.
Really?  I've never seen your build, good man. Is it effective in S6 after the Yasuo Nerf?

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3b3zUEiL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-08T01:53:35.983+0000)
>
> Really?  I've never seen your build, good man. Is it effective in S6 after the Yasuo Nerf?

it would be from the stats, but i dont know havent played in ages

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3b3zUEiL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-08T01:53:35.983+0000)
>
> Really?  I've never seen your build, good man. Is it effective in S6 after the Yasuo Nerf?

the yasuo nerf made it so he scaled more with atk spe items so building {{item:3087}} or {{item:3046}} and {{item:3006}} is now a most or you won't hit the 1.33 cap where as you could build PD and just scale to it by 11~ the ult nerf just made his early - mid game weaker if you don't build IE 2nd

So pretty much every yas tops build?

10/10 for orginality
